properties.name: plot
properties.sample: A hapless police officer is transferred to the night shift even as he clandestinely pursues a career as a stand up comedian.

properties.name: fullplot
properties.sample: Melvin is a pathetic loser of a motorcycle cop who gets demoted to working the night shift as a punishment for his constant screw-ups. During his off-duty time, however, Melvin turns to his secret obsession: comedy. He puts a paper bag over his head and performs in front of audiences as "The Unknown Comic". Unable to balance his two lives, he seeks psychiatric help to try and resolve who he really wants to be.

properties.name: consensus
properties.sample: Despite a couple of electrifying action sequences, Octopussy is a formulaic, anachronistic Bond outing.
